Pre-Game Insights: Argentina face Peru in a Copa America game on Saturday, June 29, 2024, at Hard Rock Stadium in Miami Gardens, Florida.
Lionel Messi hopes a leg injury sustained during Argentina’s 1-0 Copa America win over Chile is 'nothing serious'.
Argentina coach Lionel Scaloni said he’s planning to rest several starters in Argentina’s last Group A match, against Peru on Saturday in Florida.
Argentina will win the group unless it loses to Peru in Miami Gardens and Canada beats Chile in a game played simultaneously in Orlando.
